---
title: "Multiple Logistic Regression"
author: "Haley Uyeunten"
date: '2022-05-31'
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
```

```{r}
biopsy <- read_csv("biopsy20.csv")

biopsy <- biopsy %>%
  mutate(class = as.factor(class),
         V1_sq = V1^2,
         V4_sq = V4^2)
```
```{r}
log_reg <- logistic_reg() %>%
  set_engine("glm")

log_reg_wf <- workflow() %>%
  add_formula(class ~ V1 + V4 + V1_sq + V4_sq) %>%
  add_model(log_reg)

log_reg_fit <- log_reg_wf %>%
  fit(biopsy)

tidy(log_reg_fit)
```
1. The estimated coefficients that are significant are V4 and $V1^2$.
2. The decision boundary is quadratic because $V1^2$ has a significant coefficient.
